title: League of legends freezes in the loading screen of a game (please help)
body:
So basically my windows 10 updated itself yesterday and my computer just had a general update.  I tried several times to play league of legends games after the update but the same thing happened every  time.  That thing was when I went through champ select and was loading into the game, at some point my computer would freeze, I would not be able to click anything or move my mouse anywhere, along with a loud humming noise going through my mic. I tried reinstalling but it still did the same thing. If anyone could answer this problem I would appreciate it. 

Thanks,

Sioxor

replies.body:
Thanks! 
I had the same problem.

I've seen a few reports of some players crashing after the recent Windows 10 update.  It turns out that there's an issue with the[ Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)that's causing some players to freeze.  Disable it, and give it another go!
